main event: Several shiny, varying-sized objects were sighted by multiple witnesses over Medford, Oregon on 8th August 1949. The objects were observed flying horizontally at very high altitudes and making trail formations before disappearing and reappearing in the same area.
interesting points: The objects were sighted by individuals from different aviation-related occupations, adding credibility to the eyewitness accounts.
Witnesses reported that the objects would fly formation for a while, break off, and then reform in a trail formation before disappearing and reappearing.
The objects were visible to the unaided eye only when they reflected the sun's rays, indicating a shiny surface.
There were no definitive conclusions about the nature or identity of the objects due to the inability to make accurate observations.
The altitude of the objects was estimated to be very high, and their speed was described as varying from slow to very fast.
sighted object: shiny, varying-sized objects flying in trail formations
witnesses: Corporals, Staff Sergeants, and CAA personnel from Medford Airport
